title: Donacochara
text: Donacochara is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="Linyphiidae">dwarf spiders</a> that was first described by <a href="Eug%C3%A8ne%20Simon">Eugène Louis Simon</a> in 1884. it contains only two species: "<a href="Donacochara%20deminuta">D. deminuta</a>" and "<a href="Donacochara%20speciosa">D. speciosa</a>".
